name: Eugenia Vinson
text: It really helps me sleep!!! I never found something to take my mind off absolutely everything. I have ADHD, insomnia, and anxiety, and this works wonders.

name: Leslie Church
text: I downloaded this app and was like “is it really going to help me fall asleep faster?” And it did. I was asleep within 5 minutes!

name: Cecilia Berger
text: This app is not only beautiful, but works. I love the stories and sounds. Soothing and calming and really has made a difference.

name: Deirdre Page
text: I didn't expect this app to work but as soon as I got it I wanted to listen to one of the stories and I was out like a light.I would fully recommend this app.

name: Eugenia Dorsey
text: Every night I have used this app, I've been asleep with minutes. I highly recommend the sleep sounds.

name: Scarlett George
text: I never had a huge problem falling asleep until I began to work different shifts at work. I figured I’d give this app a try and it was truly a game changer.

name: Hedley Savage
text: Amazing. Had really bad insomnia before using this app and after listening to these bedtime stories I fall asleep within the first 5-10 minutes.

name: Amanda Hodge
text: I love listening to the stories before bed, I'm not sure what kind of magic happens but I never make it to the end before I'm in a deep sleep. Wonderful investment.

name: Thane Knapp
text: I have a very tough time sleeping and this app so far is my favorite. I notice a huge difference between the time it takes me to fall asleep when I'm using it versus when I'm not. 5 stars!

name: Caesar Stein
text: Every night I have used this app, I've been asleep with minutes. I highly recommend the sleep sounds.
